pages.text: wayukallimu l-nasa fi l-mahdi wakahlan wamina l-salihina
qalat rabbi anna yakunu li waladun walam yamsasni basharun qala kadhaliki l-lahu yakhluqu ma yashau idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu

warasulan ila bani is'raila anni qad ji'tukum biayatin min rabbikum anni akhluqu lakum mina l-tini kahayati l-tayri fa-anfukhu fihi fayakunu tayran bi-idh'ni l-lahi wa-ub'ri-u l-akmaha wal-abrasa wa-uh'yi l-mawta bi-idh'ni l-lahi wa-unabbi-ukum bima takuluna wama taddakhiruna fi buyutikum inna fi dhalika laayatan lakum in kuntum mu'minina
wamusaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina l-tawrati wali-uhilla lakum baʿda alladhi hurrima ʿalaykum waji'tukum biayatin min rabbikum fa-ittaqu l-laha wa-atiʿuni
inna l-laha rabbi warabbukum fa-uʿ'buduhu hadha siratun mus'taqimun
falamma ahassa ʿisa min'humu l-kuf'ra qala man ansari ila l-lahi qala l-hawariyuna nahnu ansaru l-lahi amanna bil-lahi wa-ish'had bi-anna mus'limuna
